meanings.definition: Capable of existing or working together harmoniously
meanings.sent1: The two friends were very compatibles and always agreed on everything.
meanings.sent2: The team members were compatibles in their approach to problem-solving.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces were so compatibles that they practically put themselves together!
meanings.sent4: Their personalities were like puzzle pieces, fitting together perfectly like compatibles.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the painting were so compatibles that they created a beautiful harmony.

meanings.definition: Items that can be used together or are suitable for use together
meanings.sent1: The computer and printer were perfect compatibles for the office setup.
meanings.sent2: The chef always ensured the ingredients were compatibles for the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The tools in the toolbox were like old friends, always being the best compatibles.
meanings.sent4: The music and the dance were like compatibles, moving in perfect rhythm together.
meanings.sent5: The flavors of the dish were such compatibles that they created a delightful taste experience.
